channel.title: A job, i need one.
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm looking forward to a new PC for christmas, but thats not going to happen, so i'm just going to ask the family for money so i can hopefully save up for a PC.
I'm looking for a PC that can run games like MW2, at a price range of $600 or less. So if you guys could recommend a good PC, I'll be thankful.
current specs:
AMD Athlon(tm) 64 Processor 3400+ 2.20 GHz Performance Rated at: 3.96 GHz 2.0 GB of RAM Microsoft Windows XP Professional ATI Radeon 4300, 1.0gb.
Or if your a really nice person with lots of christmas spirit, you can donate to me ^-^ <3 :3 [url='https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=chaz_rink2000%40yahoo%2ecom&lc=US&item_name=Help%20a%20poor%20person%2e&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donate_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted']https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=chaz_rink2000%40yahoo%2ecom&lc=US&item_name=Help%20a%20poor%20person%2e&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donate_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted[/url]

item.title: A job, i need one.
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
DIMM 2 GB DDR3-1333 OCZ Platinum
€ 50,61

MSI 790FX-GD70
€ 134,92

AMD Phenom II X4 955
€ 128,72

( Sapphire HD4890 HDMI
€ 160,28 )

Overall: € 314,25 ( or € 474,53 )

That are the core parts, I just think you have the rest( case, HDDs, DVD, PSU )

Read full topic

item.title: A job, i need one.
item.dc:creator: nietzschesaurus
item.description:
Get a job, you lazy bum. When I was your age I made extra pocket change tickling old man taints! I also had to walk to school in ten feet of snow, uphill, BOTH ways! Naked!

Your current specs kick the shit out of my current machine.

Read full topic

item.title: A job, i need one.
item.dc:creator: gwgmer
item.description:
I’m confused, is OP buying prebuilt or is he building one himself?
If you don’t know how to build a machine, get one of your friends who knows computers to build one for you. You’ll save tons.
This being said, the rig you’ve got up there should be able to run MW2 all right with a better CPU.

Read full topic

item.title: A job, i need one.
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I have been out of a job for over a year… I can haz munny too?

Read full topic

item.title: A job, i need one.
item.dc:creator: NECRO
item.description:
I’ve had an Xbox360 before, and I sold it for a graphics card. :\ (I hate controllers)… I know computers do hell of a lot more things than a console, but all i want is a computer that can just play games. I wouldnt mind having DoS if it could run MW2 all on high

Read full topic

item.title: A job, i need one.
item.dc:creator: Will89
item.description:
NECRO:

I mean, an xbox360 is only $200, and it can run games like MW2. :[

You can’t be serious about this comparison… I mean, come on, if that’s how you want to generalize things, you’d might as well just get an Xbox360 or PS3 for your gaming needs.

Read full topic

item.title: A job, i need one.
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
MW2 still looks amazing on the 360.

Read full topic

item.title: A job, i need one.
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
yeah but MW2 on the 360/PS3 is visually equivalent to mostly low with a few medium settings and no AA or AF on the PC.

item.title: A job, i need one.
item.dc:creator: Will89
item.description:
A price range of $100-$500? That isn’t going to get you very far, especially if you’re looking into generic, prebuilt systems.

@topic: I need a job, too. Been in the workforce for five years and took the last year off for college, so I feel like a bum.

Read full topic

item.description:

Hey guys, I’m looking forward to a new PC for christmas, but thats not going to happen, so i’m just going to ask the family for money so i can hopefully save up for a PC.

I’m looking for a PC that can run games like MW2, at a price range of $600 or less.
So if you guys could recommend a good PC, I’ll be thankful.
